It looks like the characters are reused and not strictly connected. It's almost like in "She used to be cool" she got depressed before moving out, and in this, she got depressed afterwards.

In this chapter, she's surprised to see her brother because she was convinced the whole thing was a dream, it was too convenient to be real. They continue their relationship, but the reality of depression isn't logical. No matter how happy she is, her highest highs are matched with her lowest lows (speculation on my half).

Yuuya saves her, but his fate is uncertain. She stays by his side, reminiscing their lives together, and when it gets dark out, Yuuya conveniently awakes. Most likely, she fell asleep and this is just a dream, but regardless, she gets her feelings across. "I love you. I love you so much."

Super tragic, tears in my eyes, 0/0, but also 10/10.

[No matter what…even if this is a dream. Even if my wonderful cool Yuuya who loves someone like me doesn’t forgive me… I won’t lose my way anymore. I…] “Hey listen…you know. I’m in love with you. I love you so much Yuuya.” [I’ll give you a happy future]

There may be errors. Should be right for the most part I think. Idk I’m a 素人 if there’s an error reply and lmk.

I’ll try to translate from P. 48 onwards omitting some lines to make this short. “What’s up Yuuya?” “…I was only just admiring the night view haha~” “Hey…when do you think this’ll end? Today? Tomorrow? Until I die I’ll be your hope but before I die I want you to become my happiness. Let’s get into bed.”*biting noises* “Hey that tickles!” [p.71] “I’ve known Yuuya from the moment he was born. It’s the same Yuuya who’s so honest and kind, never losing hope. Yuuya, my precious brother who grew into a wonderful man. The man who loves me. Whenever I’m feeling down he comes home to cheer me up. I’m okay, I can do it. I want to repay his kindness. If I do stuff with him like this [sex]  he’ll love me more. More. More. More. I’m sorry. I’m sorry. Soon…it’ll all end. The time limit expired. From now on, I’m alone. I can do it by myself. I have to do my best…! It’s okay…it’s okay. Ahhh…we used to have so much fun back then.” “Sorry! Did it hit you? Are you hurt?!” “…I’m okay” [cont.]

For people who think that "We Used to Be Happy 1/2" is a sequel to "She Used to Be Cool 1/2", it doesn't make sense, I'll explain why:

-At the end of "She Used to Be Cool" it is mentioned that Yuuta (the boy) and Sis (the girl) are not blood brothers. 

- besides having their parents' blessing, they are going to get married in the future.

There is no reason that, already having such a strong relationship, there is so much distance between them as it turns out to be in "We Used to Be Happy".

For everybody asking, this is a separate series from She Used to Be Cool, NO THEY ARE NOT A CONTINUATION

The male characters have different names. Yes, Yuuya and Yuuta are similar but this is probably just the authors naming convention. Take into account that the main characters of his other works are named Yuuma in two different stories and again Yuuta in a separate story, nakani is just reusing this name and similar ones

Here is my understanding. The sister loves her brother since she was very young and all the lewd thing she did to him before was to repay his kindness for her. However, she did not know that her brother loves her and thought this kind of life will end when she begins working and living alone without her brother. The stress of her work and the absense of her brother made her feel helpless and want to commit a suiside, but her brother's showing up that night stopped this from happening. After that, the brother kept looking after the sister and finally, after the train event, she realized that her brother is always loving her and caring for her. So she gives up the thought of suiside and live with her brother happy ever after. Sorry for my bad english but the story is definitely a 10/10 and nakani is a god
